Reviews.Title: perfect choice
Reviews.Author: notaskater
Reviews.Content: phone needs no contract -- it suits my needs for occasional usage. it is exactly what i was looking for!!

Reviews.Title: Cheap phone that does everything you need
Reviews.Author: ALP
Reviews.Content: Look, we all know there are more advanced phones out there now. Just think back to when touch screens didn't have the typical android or apple feel, and this is what this phone is. It has a browser, it takes decent pictures, even has A2DP streaming for bluetooth. Does everything fine. Great phone for the price, which is about 1/10th the price of Apple phones, especially if you buy it from the sellers selling new phones as refurbs or used because Amazon makes them. Overall great little phone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect replacement phone!
Reviews.Author: Spencer
Reviews.Content: Does everything I need and at a great price!  Why waste money paying for an early upgrade when this works for way less?

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: C. Carroll
Reviews.Content: There's a lot of things I don't like about this phone. The touch is too sensitive, except when I accidentally call someone and want to hang up before they answer. That's when it seems the touch feature doesn't work right, but that's the only way to disconnect the call. As a secretary, I send a lot of group text messages, but this phone makes that difficult as well and it caps the number of recipients at 25. I would not buy it again or recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Not happy.
Reviews.Author: Gina Monti
Reviews.Content: Bank account was never credited the amount. Not happy with the return process. It takes too long. By then returning it is too late

ProductInfo.Features:
Fast 3G connectivity thanks to Sprint's EV-DO, Rev A network with average download speeds ranging from 400 to 700 Kbps and peak rates up to 2 Mbps.
Bluetooth connectivity (version 2.1) includes profiles for communication headset, hands-free car kits, and A2DP audio streaming.
Web Browser; Fulll Slide-out QWERTY keyboard; Full messaging capabilities including SMS text, MMS picture/video and IM instant messaging; Personal and corporate e-mail access with support for Exchange ActiveSync as well as personal e-mail accounts (Google push, Yahoo!, POP3, IMAP).
2.8-inch Touchscreen display; MicroUSB port; Memory expansion via microSD card slot with support for optional cards up to 32 GB
1.3-megapixel camera; Music player compatible with MP3 and AAC/AAC+;
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Trender M380 Sprint CDMA Phone with 1.3MP Camera, QWERTY Keyboard, Bluetooth and MicroSD Slot - Sapphire Blue
